casebody.data:
Kareem HEDGE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016. William A. Snider, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Adam E. Mattel, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

On reconsideration of the petitioner Kareem Hedge's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 152 Conn.App. 44 , 97 A.3d 45 (2014), is denied.
